formalText: States that she wants to get back to her dorm to study instead of talking
Next visit, I need to bring her mom in and have a discussion about the next steps to help. I would like to do more tests to check her electrolytes and her blood count.
She states,  "I do want to be better"
When asked, "How much have you been eating?" she responded that she is eating enough and has talked to her nutritionist
States, "I am busy and not concerned about happiness.
I need to train and I am tired of everyone asking me about what I eat and how much I exercise and the smartest in my class and one of the best Runners on the team"
Says, "I am eating I tell my mom what I eat just because I'm not fat like she is"
She has a track meet coming up also is training as a runner.
Agrees to have her mom come in next visit
There are irregular rhythms in her heart and there is downy hair on her back and arms.
